item.title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs trial updates: Ventura challenged about text message exchanges
item.description: Sean "Diddy" Combs is standing trial on sex trafficking and racketeering charges in a case that has captured widespread attention.

item.title: 4 dead in fiery highway crash in New York City suburb
item.description: Police say four people were killed when a van crossed over a highway median north of New York City and crashed into an oncoming car

item.title: WATCH: Diver's heart-stopping moment as shark attacks camera
item.description: A diver captured the terrifying moment sharks attacked a camera his friend was holding while they traversed a reef in Australia’s Coral Sea.
